card_text: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Activate 1 of these effects.$N●This card gains 400 ATK.$N●Target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.$N●Special Summon 1 "Option Token". Its Type, Attribute, Level, and ATK/DEF are always the same as this card, but destroy it if this card is no longer face-up on the field.
